file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-00-06 - MAIN LANDING GEAR AND DOORS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN LANDING GEAR AND DOORS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do an inspection of the Main Landing Gear (MLG) doors for general condition. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 32-10-00-200-801-A ♦ MLG DOORS - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG DOORS - INSPECTION A. General (1) This inspection procedure is applicable to the MAIN and AUXILIARY doors of the LH and RH MLG. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 721 721 RH MLG Doors - RH 722 722 RH MLG Doors - RH 731 731 LH MLG Doors - LH 732 732 LH MLG Doors - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH and RH MLG I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that landing gear safety pins are installed on MLGs ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). J. Visually Check Main Landing Gear, Including Doors and Spring Cartridges (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Inspect the rods (1) that connect the MAIN door (2) to the MLG leg (3) for general condition and attachment points. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Inspect the upper articulation points (4) of the MAIN door (2) for general condition. (3) Inspect the bolt retaining plates (5) at the upper articulation points (4) of the MAIN door (2) for general condition. (4) Inspect the AUXILIARY door (6) for general condition. (5) Inspect the MAIN (2) and AUXILIARY (6) doors for backlash. (6) Inspect the bonding braids (7) of the MAIN and AUXILIARY doors for general condition. (7) Inspect the spring cartridges (8) for general conditions and make sure that the spring is not broken and that the spring attachment points are not damaged. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
